definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: A containment device aboard a boat awaits to be lowered into the water.
sentences.chinese: 一艘船上的阻绝设备正等待下放到水中。

sentences.english: The barrier layer is positioned on the substrate.
sentences.chinese: 所述阻绝层位于所述底材上。

sentences.english: It will effectively block excess calories from entering your energy field through the five physical senses.
sentences.chinese: 它能有效地阻绝多馀的热量经由五感进入你的能量场。

definition: to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
to cover/to hide from view/to obstruct or block/defilade (military)
to break or cut in two/to sever/to cut off/(fig.) to cut off (a conversation, a flow etc)/to interrupt/(math.) to truncate
partition/to stand between/wall or fence serving as partition
to stop/to obstruct/to bar the way
to cache/to hide supplies (from the enemy)
